name: Tab icons generator [Tumblr tab icons]
description: Feed it an image (36h x 175w), it gives you tab icons for your dashboard.
additional_info:
This style applies your old dashboard tab icons to Tumblr's new tabs layout. Here's the mapping from old icons to new icons:
Home ← Home Mail ← Mail Explore ← Help Account ← Settings XKit (optional) ← Logout
The tab icons image should be 36h x 175w.

style_setting_options.label: All of the tab icons
Just the Home icon
Both the XKit and Help icons
